name: SYLVAN
author: belie that
notes: This was a frustrating season to reach KoG.  Reached Legend 3 with Aliens and Golden Flying fish decks, and lost the rank up game 3 times with countless demotions back to Legend 1.  Finally got it done with Sylvans.  Ultimate Providence is MVP of this deck.  Thanks for all the insight Dkayed, third month in a row KoG
